text:
@DavidCornDC Very misleading. 

She volunteered to take a big pay cut, and is paying furloughed staff to stay home so that they don’t go hungry. 

All hospitals are bleeding cash. Most non COVID19 services shut down! 

Every caregiver, every day, is faced with hazards. We sign up for it.
